name: Lost in Space (itch) (hellbladenz)
description:
Description

You are stranded in space with a storm approaching which your ship is not protected against. You need to get to the closest space station in order to survive.

Keep pushing forward, each successive level gets bigger with more objects. Be on the lookout to replenish your power, you don't want to get caught with none.

Version Details

V1.0 - Original version
V1.1 - Added on 1/08/17. Fixed turrets not shooting.

Added Linux version - you will need to chmod it to make it executable.

Note: On the main menu there is an checkbox that sets movement to be relative to the ship's direction. May make the game feel better if you enable it

The desktop version is recommended but there is a WebGL version located here: https://hellbladenz.itch.io/lost-in-space-webgl

Made for the Ludum Dare 39 game jam, theme being 'Running out of Power'.
Graphics and audio not made by me, credit contained in the "Assets Credit.txt" file.
